alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 12:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 1245 PM PDT... At 1220 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clover Valley, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clover Valley, Ruby Valley and Secret Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
